data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used for comparison of the occurrence of macrovascular disease and risk factors (e.g. cerebro-vascular disease, coronary arterial disease, peripheral vascular disease, death) in DCCT volunteers randomized to the standard versus those randomized to the experimental group (for published results see <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/7732997?ordinalpos=2&itool=EntrezSystem2.PEntrez.Pubmed.Pubmed_ResultsPanel.Pubmed_DefaultReportPanel.Pubmed_RVDocSum"> PMID 7732997</a>). Average follow-up time was 6.5 years. (2) Repeated measures of putative risk factors (see also: (1) Detailed Record of macrovascular events, pht000231, ms5exprt)

variable.name: ORIGIN
variable.description: Source of event data (Calculated: derived from automated comparison; hardcode: coded explicitly in setup program; master: master data set)

variable.name: EVT_CODE
variable.value: UNDOCUMENTED ANGINA;12=CARDIAC ARRHYTHMIA;13=MAJOR EKG ABNORMALITY;14=SILENT MI;15=CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE;16=STROKE;17=TRANSIENT ISCHEMIC ATTACK;18=AMPUTATION;19=ARTERIAL EVENT (REQUIRING SURGERY);20=CLAUDICATION;21=CONFIRMED CLAUDICATION;22=UNCONFIRMED CLAUDICATION;23=FOOT ULCER (REQUIRING HOSPITALIZATION);24=PERSISTENT LOSS OF PEDAL PULSES;30=FOCAL NEUROPATHY;31=PAIN IN EXTREMITIES;32=MEDICATION FOR PAIN;90=CVA W/PERMANENT NEURAL DEFICIENCY;91=CVA W/OUT PERMANENT NEURAL DEFICIENCY

FOOT ULCER (REQUIRING HOSPITALIZATION);24=PERSISTENT LOSS OF PEDAL PULSES;30=FOCAL NEUROPATHY;31=PAIN IN EXTREMITIES;32=MEDICATION FOR PAIN;90=CVA W/PERMANENT NEURAL DEFICIENCY;91=CVA W/OUT PERMANENT NEURAL DEFICIENCY

variable.name: DISEASE
variable.description: Type of disease (death, cad, cvd, pvd)
variable.value: USED TO DISTINGUISH DUPLICATE DESCRIPTIONS IN CATEGORY HEADINGS FROM DETAILED EVENT DESCRIPTIONS

variable.name: DEGREE
variable.description: Degree of disease (death, major event, other, nil [events less severe than 'other events of interest'])
